text_block_list.text: After school, on my way to the Training Course, I bumped in to an Uma Musume I recognized and another I didn't.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Uwaaaaaaaaah!! Uhyaaaaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: The road behind that building over there leads to the music room and kitchen. And this way leads to the building with the indoor pool.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Hokkaido is sprawling too, but to think just one school would be this big! I might get lost once… or maybe 5 times.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …Oh? If I recall, you're team <Sirius>'s trainer.
Good afternoon. It seems you already know me.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Trainer…?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yes, if you want to enter the Twinkle Series, you're required to be a part of a team.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: And this person here is someone who's trained several G1 Uma Musume. Team <Sirius>'s trainer.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Eh? So they're an important person…! Good afternoon, I'm Special Week!!
I wouldn't say important… That aside, it seems like you're both looking around campus.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I just recently transferred here from Hokkaido. So I asked Suzuka-san to give me a tour.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: On top of that, to participate in races I need to join a team, right? Just being admitted to the academy isn't enough…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: In that case, I want to join the same team as Suzuka-san! I'd get to see Suzuka-san run from up close, no from right beside her, everyday!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Um… to join a team it's necessary to be scouted first. Joining the team because you want to is…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Uwaaaah! Scouted! Just like a celebrity! I'll do my best so I can be scouted!
choice_data_list: You're, how do I say this, very energetic

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …Well then, we'll excuse ourselves here.
Okay, see ya.
She had an overwhelming victory in her Debut, but placed 8th during [Yayoi Sho]. In regards to that, there was something I wanted to ask her, but…
But that's probably a bit impertinent.
But that's probably a bit impertinent.
A few days after that, at a Selection Race-
Yo, observing this race?
Oh, observing this race?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: <Sirius>'s Trainer-san. Yes, Special Week-san is participating.
I was surprised when I saw the race schedule. She just transferred here but is already running in a Selection Race.
Usually, the Uma Musume admitted to Tracen Academy takes classes on the basics of running and challenge the Selection Race at an appropriate time, but-
She probably entered this early so she could join the same team as you as soon as possible.
She probably entered this early so she could join the same team as you as soon as possible.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: That may be the case… But it seems like Special Week-san already has a dream in mind.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: A dream to run in the Twinkle Series, and become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume".

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I've just met her, but Special Week-san's straight-forward feelings reached me.
Silence Suzuka's facial expression while saying that, seemed very melancholy… Completely different from her expression during her Debut race.
Somehow, it seems like you're speaking as if you haven't sorted out your own feelings yet.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Eh…?

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Selection Race, 3rd Round. The participating Uma Musume have settled in to their gates.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ah… the race is starting.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Number 6, Special Week! To make up for her late start, she enters a Long Spurt from the third corner!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: She's catching up! And now she's taking the lead!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Special Week-san, could it be…!
She's got considerable determination for victory, how could I have missed that?! And that straight-forward expression… she might do it!
She's got considerable determination for victory, how could I have missed that?! And that straight-forward expression… she might do it!
With the way Special Week is running, after moving to Tokyo to chase her dreams, she might really be able to realize her dreams… however-

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: …Wait!? What's wrong with Special Week?! Special Week stopped and is just standing there. What's she waving at?!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I did it, Suzuka-san! I got first place!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Oh no! It seems like she's mistaken where the goal was! In the meantime, everyone is passing Special Week!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ehhhhhhh?!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Um, starting today I'll be in your care, I'm Special Week! Please treat me well!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Uwooooo!! A new member! Special Week, so Spe-chan! Treat me well!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I really wanted to join Suzuka-san's team but, I really screwed up during the Selection Race…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: But! But! Trainer-san spoke to me and told me <Sirius> was a great team so I joined!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hooooou… So <Sirius> was just an after thought for you.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: …eh?! N-no! You're wrong! It's true that I wanted to join the same team as Suzuka-san though…

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: So you came here because you were out of luck!! I'm gonna make you "Japan's Most Unfortunate Uma Musume"!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ueeeeeeeeehhh!?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: C'mon!! Don't stand there spacin' out!! If you wanna become Japan's #1 then run like hell!!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: U-understoooood!!
She's a little rough around the edges, but like Silence Suzuka said, her pure desire to chase her dream reached me.
Special Week is someone who makes you feel like you want to support those straight-forward dreams.
